players.name: Alice
memory: Charlie: "I find it strange that Bob was the one who got eliminated during the night. Let's keep a close eye on each other and try to figure out what might have happened."
Diana: "I agree with Charlie that we need to keep a close eye on each other. It's important for us to work together and share any suspicions or concerns we might have."

Charlie: "I think it's important that we all share any information we might have about last night. I didn't notice anything out of the ordinary, but I do remember seeing Alice and Bob talking quietly to each other before bed."

Diana: "I remember seeing Alice and Bob's conversation before bed as well, Charlie. It seemed suspicious to me. We should keep a close eye on Alice and try to gather more information about their possible involvement in Bob's death."
You: "Let's not jump to conclusions about me. I was just talking to Bob about a game we were playing together, nothing more."
